entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 this morning. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
